title: Good place with nearby attractions
text:
Good place with nearby attractions
We stayed there for 4 nights and picked this place due to proximity of all the major attractions. Some key pointers from the staying experience.
-	Good spacious rooms with helpful staffs
-	Good spread of buffet 
-	Ample parking spaces if you are travelling by own car
-	All the major attractions are in proximity (4-5 kms radius), such as Birla Mandir, Hussain Sagar, Salarjung, Nizam palace, Charminar
-	Auto and cabs are easily available
The only thing to keep in mind that the hotel is located at very busy road, taking car out and in might be little tricky some hour of day.
Overall, we had nice experience and enjoyed our stay

title: Most Noisy Hotel
text: The three nights' stay at the hotel was a really unpleasant one. There was a large group of unruly and mischievous young college boys and girls  staying at the hotel. Every night, it appeared that all of them were high and would run around in the corridors, scream and yell and also ring other rooms' door bells till about 3am. Although i complained to the front desk, they were totally helpless. It appears that the hotel often gets lot of tourist bookings through travel sites and hence have high occupancy. People looking for peaceful nights would certainly want to avoid this hotel.

ownerResponse/text:
Dear TripAdvisor member,

Thank you for sharing such a lovely review of your recent stay at the Hyderabad Marriott Hotel and Convention Centre. We are thrilled to hear that you had a comfortable and memorable experience with us. Your kind words about our team members, Chef Shekh Sadam, Payale, and Kranti are truly appreciated. It’s wonderful to know that you enjoyed the biryani and the breakfast spread, and that our colleagues went the extra mile to ensure your comfort and satisfaction. We take great pride in delivering warm hospitality and exceptional culinary experiences, and feedback like yours is a testament to the dedication of our team. Rest assured; your compliments will be shared with everyone mentioned they will be delighted to know they made a positive impact on your stay. We look forward to welcoming you and your friends back for many more delightful moments.

Warm regards,
Amardeep Singh
General Manager
Hyderabad Marriott Hotel and Convention Centre

title: Beautiful stay
text:
Friendly and polite staff and beautiful hotel at the prime location. Had a warm stay. The staff were very accommodative when we requested late check out. The only drawback was, we had take 2 rooms each at different floors and I had to handover certain stuff to a member in the upper floor, I couldn’t use the lift without having the access card and even the staff refused to help me with regards to this when asked to.   
But other than this we had a beautiful stay.

title: Misnomer Marriott
text:
I have been at Various Marriott Properties-this one is an exception-absolutely fail to understand how the property got the Marriott Franchise.
The rooms, its size, upkeep, aesthetics leave much to be desired.
It is not a patch on Marriott not even a poor cousin.
Some Rich or Influential person somehow hoodwinked Marriott and got labelled as Marriott.
The TV is installed at probably 135 Degrees from the bed-and one can get a crooked neck if one watches TV from the bed.
The F & B is a different scenario-a chilli  chicken had  such small  crumbs which could not be picked up with a fork.
Staff at Breakfast was not aware they have a tea counter.
Agreed Marriott has various brands-probably this property may not fit to the lowest category Marriott.
The Hotel is situated by the open steam of ullage/open gutter-which STINKS

title: Average Stay, but needs improvement in maintenance
text:
Greetings!
We stayed there for 3 nights for the Hyderabad visit.  The ambiance at the lounge and the restaurant was excellent. The reception office needs improvement in the service. My luggage was unattended and was not delivered at the room. I had to go myself to the reception and the get the luggage to the room.  The house keeping was excellent, but every night when we return back, the access card to the room will not work. We have to go downstairs at the reception to re-activate it. A 15 minutes job to re-activate and this process is very hectic, when we all are tired.  Also the corridor carpet to the room was stinky and smelly. The room interior is good, but not maintained properly ( broken toilet shower, partially closing toilet door etc). The restaurant breakfast was excellent and staff was very caring. But very afraid for the reviews of the rudeness of front office, but managed to make them cool for 2-3 incidents at the stay.  Overall satisfactory stay at Hyderabad. Thanks.
placeInfo/address: 8 Raj Bhavan Road Somajiguda, Hyderabad 500082 India
placeInfo/addressObj/street1: 8 Raj Bhavan Road

title: Unlike Mariott
text:
Was here for 2 nights on a business / family trip. As such most of staff were courteous except the few who picked up our calls and tried to defend the issues. 
It is a very old franchise owned and Mariott branded property. I am not sure about other rooms but ours had paint patch work which one could easily see , both nights we couldn’t sleep because there was some party going on and music was blaring at its full volume, when we called nobody could help.  Room walls and roofing has no sound proofing one could easily hear toilet flush sound and every else.

I understand it’s a franchise but how can Mariott compromise on the comfort, quality and aesthetics .

title: A beautiful oasis in the heart of Hyderabad.
text: Had a wonderful 2 day stay at the property. Everything from the facade and the layout if the gardens, interiors and the room has an old world charm. Strikingly beautiful and as the huge stone elephants all around. The security and front desk was courteous, cooperative and very attentive. The Orca restaurant where we dined had an impressive fare and cheerful and attentive staff. Shall be coming back again for my stays in Hyderabad. The gym is by far the most loaded in all the star hotels I have had stayed at and met all the requirements of a regular gym goer. Special mention must be made to after stay engagement for registration on the Mariott app by Mr Prakash Vohra. He ensured a seamless registation and review process and is appreciated. Very impressed with the property, it's staff and it's backend support. Highly recommended for the beautiful views, super cool gardens, loaded gym and courteous staff.

title: Amazing quality staff
text:
This hotel has the best staff service I have ever experienced in a hotel.  When we received notice the night before that our train would not come to Hyderabad the concierge staff worked tirelessly talking with train service and then arranging a reliable driver instead, even giving the driver clear instructions that safety came first.  When staff overheard my wife casually mentioning that the pool has seen better days, hotel management profusely apologized  and sought to make amends, though we didn't even mention the issue to them.  When we left, they packed us lunches without charge.  This is a hotel with staff that are really really trying to please their customers.  

Hotel is well located for Secunderabad, and still a shortish taxi (20-30 min) to reach historic Hyderabad.  It overlooks the (unfortunately smelly) large lake, but one doesn't notice the smell inside of course.  Food was excellent.  We sought an American-style hotel in which not everything was filled with hot chilis, and the hotel delivered.  I would stay here again.
ownerResponse/text:

It’s heartening to hear that our concierge team was able to assist you during a challenging situation with your travel plans, and that our commitment to safety and guest comfort was evident throughout your stay. Your appreciation for our team’s attentiveness, including their response to your wife’s casual remark and the gesture of packing lunches for your journey, means a great deal to us. These moments reflect our genuine desire to go above and beyond for our guests, and we are thrilled that it resonated with you. We are also pleased that you enjoyed our culinary offerings and found our location convenient for exploring both Secunderabad and historic Hyderabad. It was a pleasure to host you, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay.

Warm regards,
Amardeep Singh
General Manager
Hyderabad Marriott Hotel and Convention Centre

title: Superb hotel with extraordinary experience
text:
Superb service. So Marriot. Was there for a business trip for a short stay but it was so nicely organized.
Thanks to the team for a surprise birthday celebration. Really thoughtful.
The food and service is excellent. In fact u loved the sambhar. Great breakfast spread. Very sumptuous and the overall service is so so good. I mean Marriot just lives upto its name. 
Special mention to Mr. Sauvik the manager. I had a small issue in my room which was immediately addressed. So not really too problematic. But the way Mr. Saumik responded to it was phenomenal. I mean from sending along excellent coffee for my travel to writing personally - it is service at its best.
In a hotel which receives tons of guests this type of a service just makes you feel so special and welcome. 
Also if visiting do chat with Mr. Vohra, the very warm and dynamic guest relations head. Such a pleasure chatting with him.
Loved every bit of it and looking forward to staying again very soon. Keep up the great work. 

Cheers,
Nidhi Sinha

title: Wonderful Care at Courtyard Marriott & Marriott Convention
text:
It was our 13th Marriage Anniversary and we decided to club our work and holidays at Hyderabad. Must say great reception and care throughout was accorded by the Hotel Manager Mr. Ashwin Vaidya. It was our early checkin and our arrival tracked. Special Thanks to Madam Sanika Pradhan for her help and guidance. We were felicitated with a traditional welcome with tikka and a shawl on our shoulders. Our Rooms decorated with also towel art and balloons in the room. The Rooms were at its best with welcome amenities and delicious designed chocolates. Despite being a Gold Member, I was offered their Lounge facility. A big shout out and special thanks to Mr. Rugved Dacha, Loyalty Manager, Mr. Saumik Sur, Rooms Division Manager, Housekeeping Manager Mr. Jitendra Yadav and Mr. Pankaj Singh from Housekeeping. Their service was marvellous ensuring us all the possible care needed. Special Thanks also to Mr. Akshat Selat for ensuring smooth transition from Courtyard Room to Marriott Room internally. 
We also had great food hospitality from Gaurav Mahadeshwar and Tanay Kala. The food was exceptionally great and enjoying at Okra & Bidri. Tremendous and personal support received from Gaurav and Tanay. Both of them were simply fabulous in their treatment towards us. We were delighted to be offered fresh juice and special dosa and paratha were made for us. We are indeed very grateful to both of them for this hospitality. Appreciate Himanshu F&B from Marriott too.
Appreciate the leadership and congratulate Mr. Ashwin for having such a wonderful, fabulous, effective team that are on its toes to ensure their guest comfortable. 
In one single word Amazing Experience and really thank you for making our Anniversary so very special.
I look forward recommending to my friends in Hyderabad to conduct events in this Hotel.
Thanks,
Vijay P
ownerResponse/text:
Dear TripAdvisor member,

Thank you for sharing such a heartfelt and detailed review of your recent stay at the Hyderabad Marriott Hotel and Convention Centre and Courtyard by Marriott. We are truly honoured that you chose to celebrate your 13th Marriage Anniversary with us, and we are delighted to know that your experience was nothing short of exceptional. It brings us immense joy to hear that Mr Ashwin Vaidya and our dedicated team, including Ms Sanika Pradhan, Mr Rugved Dacha, Mr Saumik Sur, Mr Jitendra Yadav, Mr Pankaj Singh, and Mr Akshat Selat, were able to make your stay so memorable. Their commitment to personalised service and attention to detail is a reflection of our core values, and your appreciation will certainly be shared with them. We are also thrilled that you enjoyed the culinary delights at Okra and Bidri, and that Gaurav Mahadeshwar, Tanay Kala, and Himanshu from our Food & Beverage team made your dining experience truly special. Your kind words are a wonderful encouragement to all of us. Thank you once again for your generous feedback and for recommending our hotel to your friends. We look forward to welcoming you back soon and creating many more cherished memories together.

text:
During my recent stay at your hotel, I was thoroughly impressed by the outstanding service and immaculate cleanliness maintained throughout the premises. I would like to extend special praise to the exceptional cleaning staff: Maduri, Manitha, and Parameswar.

From the moment I arrived, it was evident that the hotel prioritizes cleanliness and attention to detail. My room was spotless, and every day it was refreshed to the highest standards. Maduri, Manitha, and Parameswar demonstrated exceptional dedication and professionalism in their work. They were consistently friendly, courteous, and went above and beyond to ensure my comfort.

The common areas, including the lobby, hallways, and dining area, were always well-maintained and clean, contributing to a pleasant and welcoming atmosphere. The meticulous work of these three individuals did not go unnoticed. They are a true asset to your team, showcasing the quality and hospitality that your hotel stands for.

Their efforts made my stay incredibly enjoyable and stress

title: Good Hospitality
text:
I had a stay at the Royalton Hotel and I must say I’d a great overall experience which is worth a mention here. First up the location of this hotel is closer to a lot of popular tourist attractions of Hyderabad including some of the best restaurants especially if you love the famous biryani alongside mughalai cuisines.

During my stay I’ve absolutely loved the hospitality of hotel staff special mention to Amit Saini at the front desk for his customer centric, friendly and accommodating nature to ensure my stay was pleasant and well looked after. Thank You Amit Saini.

In summary, It was an ‘awesome’ experience and something that I’ll recommend if you are looking for a stay in the hearts of the city. And lastly Keep up the Good work Royalton Hotel, Staff and Their Management.

Thank you All

title: Mediocre experience and terrible breakfasts
text:
After having stayed at most prominent properties in the city, finally narrowed down upon Courtyard Hyderabad and Marriott Hyderabad for a split stay during my 12 day long work trip to Hyderabad, of which the first 7 was at courtyard and the next 5 at Marriott. 

The stay at Marriott Hyderabad & convention centre was overall quite mediocre. 

Common area & Rooms
The hotel overall felt quite old and very cramped. The room was exactly the same, specially with the twin beds choice we had opted for. There were parts of the hotel which had a stench, not something you expect at the price point. 

We got a swimming pool view room, thanks to which I avoided visiting the pool. The pool was among the least inviting ones I have seen across hotel chains in Hyderabad. 

Food / breakfasts
While they have a lavish breakfast spread, almost everything was inedible on all occasions. While I could explain this in painful details, here are some highlights:
- sabudhana khichdi which extremely oily
- Aloo parata where the first half I had tasted fab, but ended up being undercooked on every occasion after
- Dosas which lacked the sourness
- The day I found dhoklas and was excited about the new alternative, it just withered away at the the touch of the fork. Tasting mediocre was a separate problem. 

By day 4 and 5 of our stay here, we had moved to finding alternates:
Filter coffee (which was fab) became a meal replacement. 
Fruit counters had long wait times and there is no surprises why

On the other hand, bidri dining experience was fabulous (reviewing it separately). The baking company and room service for dinner was quite good too. 

Service
The staff were largely courteous and special mentions to the gentleman who was a repeat feature during our room service orders and the young lady who attended to us at Bidri. But what put me off was that they refused to accept tips if added to bill or room. Pay in cash or not seemed to be the hotel-wide policy. 

Pricing
The property is priced comparably to the Taj’s and ITC’s of similar vintage. But not necessarily offering a similar experience. Since I took a club Marriott membership, I had some discounts which forced me to continue with the booking. 

Overall, one property that is surely going into my negative list and I would highly recommend its twin, the courtyard Marriott over this.

title: EXCELLENT & RELAXING PLACE TO STAY IN HYDERABAD, COURTEOUS STAFF, TASTY FOOD,  TIGHT SECURITY, CLEAN SUPERVISED  GYM
text:
Excellent staff, the best location in front of the lake, and food.
The front office staff is excellent, Yash and his colleagues were very courteous and hospitable. Guest service managers like Rugved make you are at home.
The living spaces are excellent, the pools are well maintained, and 3-layer security is noted. Personal trainers in Gymnasium are good and Gym is very clean. 
The lounge on the top floor is a great place to entertain your local guests in the evening, has a full lake view from the top
The exterior needs a fresh coat of paint. Exterior needs regular maintenance of this landmark and historical building.
Strongly recommend this place, there are lots of old and reliable shopping areas less than a KM from the hotel, MG Circle, General Bazar, and Monda Market areas.
Avoid the traffic mess of Hitec city, Madhapur, etc, save hours and hours relaxing instead of sitting in your standstill cars inhaling toxic automobile smoke in this very busy city.

title: Super Stay and Value for Money
text:
I and my sister visit last week for our hyderabad trip and stayed for 5 days, the rooms and service is good. The best was the supportive and caring staff, they guided and helped us . The breakfast is also nice. The plus point of this hotel is its location, near to metro station and all the tourist locations are nearby which will make it easy for you to reach any location in max 20 to 25 mins. I would surely recommend this hotel.👍

Rooms
Rooms are good and provide standard amenities like towel, soap,shampoo,water bottles everyday

Nearby activities
Hussain sagar lake, birla temple, secretariat building, Ntr gardens,ujjaini mahakali temple all are jus 10-15mins away. Rajthali is an rajasthani veg food (himayat nagar) awesome thali and food. Presently there is mango season going on. Airport is just 35 to 40 mins away. Salar jung museum, chowmahalla place n charminar also max 25 mins you can reach. Best is Ramoji film city transportation pick up location ( central court hotel) is next to this hotel so in case u r visiting ramoji film city which one time must visit, its transportation bus will pick from this hotel.

Safety
Its is very safe for family or solo ladies or group of ladies.

title: A stay worthwhile
text: We were on our road trip to hyderabad and ended up booking a place that was unpleasant, the next morning we searched for other stays in Lakdikapul and founs this. We requested and they were willing to show the room and we right away booked it out. It was a three day stay at this hotel and my parents and spouse loved the courteousness of the front staff (at reception: Mudasir , Naresh and all the folks  that come in around 8 during the morning shift), cannot miss the housekeeping team that kept the rooms smelling good and clean to come to after a tiring sight seeing day (housekeeping: Shewanti, Neha, Prasanna)... a special mention to Praveen in the Buffet restaurant and the security guards... it had a good parking space too and very close to metro station...

title: Ms. Juveria
text:
I have stayed in this hotel multiple time and the high quality of service and attention to detail remains. The staff is amazing the rooms have been comfortable and immaculate.

In past year I stayed in The park Hyderabad hotel I find Royalton is much better than any other hotels, I must say that everything was excellent as always. The location of the hotel is close to my destination as well as some others business centers in the city. 

I would definitely recommend this hotel to others having a business trip or family vacations or destination wedding or reception it’s perfect for any occasions. 

Special thanks to Hotel Manafer Mr. Srinivas Sir, who had arrange in all sold out days one executive room for me. Thank you so much Sir really appreciate your effort and kindness…

title: Stayed in Sept 2022
text: Front desk staff are good, friendly and helpful. Do not allow guest to bring food or alcoholic beverages from outside into the room. Because want to promote their own restaurant and alcoholic beverages to guest. Give you 10% discount if you eat at their restaurant where food is average. I ate there because I had no choice during my stay it was raining every afternoon onwards and afraid of flooding since it was my first visit to Hyderabad. Room average. Room service good. I don't recommend their travel desk. Most of the autorickshaw driver don't where this hotel is. And very hard to find.  Touring from the USA booked this from the USA looking at reviews. Will I stay here again no.

title: Stay at Royalton for 4 nights
text:
Was very disappointed with the hotel. Not value for money. Not maintained well.... Bathroom tap leaking, bathroom door making lot of noise, rooms not cleaned properly by housekeeping people.
Breakfast taste was basic, staff very uncourteous, menu very limited, swimming pool is not available,
Need to call lot of times for basic requirements like hand towel, shower cap, etc....
Wifi strength is very poor.
We had paid 5k in advance for booking but at the time of check in, the front office staff made us pay full amount bill. So unfortunately we didn't have option to change the hotel the next day.
Won't suggest this hotel to anyone.

title: Worst experience even for local standards let alone traveling from abroad
text: As a group we stayed at 6 cities in over 2 weeks and I will rate this hotel as our worst experience.
